sentences.chinese: 不要讓披頭散髮的少女。

sentences.english: Mom was stick thin, worn looking and with disheveled hair.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽瘦骨如柴，披頭散髮，顯示出一副疲憊的樣子。

sentences.english: With my hair down, so. What shall we do to-morrow?
sentences.chinese: 披頭散髮，就這樣。明天我們將有何勾當？

sentences.english: Allow yourself to mess with your hair in certain occasions.
sentences.chinese: 允許偶爾披頭散髮，但要注重場合。

sentences.english: Allow occasional disheveled, but to focus on occasion.
sentences.chinese: 允許偶爾披頭散髮，但要注重場合。
